effect.sword_shield: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
